decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and supporting documents: Location Plan; PP-01 (Existing Ground Floor Plan); PP-02 (Existing First Floor Plan); PP-03 (Existing Loft Floor Plan); PP-04 (Existing Roof Top Plan); PP-05 (Existing Elevations and Section); PP-06-C Rev R3 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); PP-07-C Rev R3 (Proposed First Floor Plan); PP-08-C Rev R3 (Proposed Loft Floor Plan); PP-09-C Rev R3 (Proposed Roof Top Plan); PP-10-C Rev R3 (Proposed Elevations and Section); PP-11-C-(R3)-3819-22-TAW-SITE-BLOCK PLAN (Proposed Site Block Plan); Supporting Statement; Fire Safety Statement.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The rooflights of the hereby approved development shall not protrude more than 0.15 metres beyond the plane of the slope of the roof when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure the development harmonises with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).
description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing conservatory); alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension incorporating Juliet balcony; and installation of two rooflights to front roofslope
